question: I can't believe my smartphone is already considered old!
You should see my fossil collection. They're from the 'Jurassic' era of smartphones!
I told my dog to play dead, and he just laid there, completely still.
Wow, he must be going for the fossil level of 'playing dead'.
Why did the fossil go to the party?
To have a 'rocking' good time!
Why did the geologist break up with his girlfriend?
He said he needed more layers, like in stratigraphy!
I'm trying to understand my feelings, it's like peeling an onion.
Sounds like emotional stratigraphy to me!
I think my love life is like stratigraphy.
It's layered and complicated!
I just bought a houseplant from the Jurassic period.
Don't you mean you bought a fern?
Why did the T-Rex bring a sunscreen?
Because the Cretaceous period was too hot!
Do you know why mammoths loved the Ice Age?
I guess it was the perfect paleoenvironment for them!
Why did the trilobite go to the spa?
To get fossilized in style, of course!
What's a dinosaur's favorite stage of fossilization?
Burial and compaction. They love a good nap!
How do you make a fossil blush?
Talk about its taphonomy!
Why did the Jurassic period break up with the Cretaceous period?
It said it needed more 'time'!
Why don't geologists ever lose track of time?
Because they always keep an eye on the Geologic Time Scale!
Why was the Geologic Time Scale awarded a medal?
For outstanding service in the field of 'time' management!
Why did the dinosaur bring an umbrella?
Because he heard there's a chance of meteor showers!
Why did the dodo bird never finish his dinner?
He was always worried about the next big extinction event!
Why was the trilobite always so paranoid?
He always had a feeling an extinction event was just around the corner!
Why don't bacteria play poker in the jungle?
Why don't we ever see elephants hiding in trees?
Because they're really good at it!
Why did the fish go to school?
He wanted to evolve into a higher class!
Why don't dinosaurs ever forget?
Because no one ever tells them anything!
Why was the geography book always unhappy?
It had too many problems!
Why did the dinosaur cross the road?
Because chickens hadn't evolved yet!
Why don't dinosaurs write with their left hand?
Because they're all dead!
What do you call a dinosaur with a great vocabulary?
Why was the dinosaur afraid to go to the library?
Because it was afraid of bookworms!
What did one carbon atom say to the other on their date?
I think we have chemistry!
Why was the carbon atom a great date?
Because it always came with a couple of extra neutrons!
Why did the archaeologist break up with the carbon atom?
Because he found a younger one!
Why did the fossil go to the spa?
Because it needed some serious exfoliation and curation!
Why did the fossil go to the art gallery?
To get some curation ideas!
Why are paleontologists good at organizing parties?
Because they are experts at preparation and curation!
Why did the dinosaur bring an umbrella?
Because according to paleoclimatology, it was going to rain a million years ago!
Why was the triceratops checking its calendar?
It was keeping track of paleoclimatology events!
Why don't paleoclimatologists make good weather forecasters?
Because their forecasts are a million years late!
Why did the fossilized plant go to the school?
Why don't trees make good historians?
Because they leave everything to paleobotanists!
Why did the tree get all dressed up?
Because it had a date with a paleobotanist!
What do you call a fossilized bug's autobiography?
An invertebrate paleontology!
Why did the snail become a fossil?
It wanted to make a shell-shocking contribution to invertebrate paleontology!
Why did the ancient octopus never get lost?
Because it left its mark in invertebrate paleontology!
Why was the dinosaur on the basketball team?
He was a true star in vertebrate paleontology and had a great jump shot!
Why did the archaeologist go to the party?
To have a roaring time talking about vertebrate paleontology!
Why did the T-Rex become a music conductor?
He wanted to add rhythm to vertebrate paleontology!
